@@ -1,22 +1,26 @@
 package main
 
 import (
     "github.com/gin-gonic/gin"
-    "github.com/joho/godotenv"
     "log"
     "os"
 )
 
 func main() {
-    err := godotenv.Load()
-    if err != nil {
-        log.Fatalf("Error loading .env file")
-    }
+    // Assemble the application
+    app := Compose()
 
+    // Create necessary directories if they don't exist

+
+    // Initialize Gin router
     router := gin.Default()
-    initializeRoutes(router)
 
+    // Initialize routes
+    initializeRoutes(router, app)
+
+    // Start the server
     port := os.Getenv("PORT")
     if port == "" {
         port = "8080"
     }

     "os"
 )
 
 func main() {
-    // Assemble the application
     app := Compose()
 
-    // Create necessary directories if they don't exist
     createDirectories()
 
-    // Initialize Gin router
     router := gin.Default()
-
-    // Initialize routes
     initializeRoutes(router, app)
 
-    // Start the server
     port := os.Getenv("PORT")
     if port == "" {
         port = "8080"
     }
     log.Fatal(router.Run(":" + port))
 }

     "github.com/gin-gonic/gin"

 )
 
 func main() {
-    app := Compose()

+    router := gin.Default()
 
-    createDirectories()
+    // Compose all services
+    controlPanelDriverAdapter := Compose()
 
-    router := gin.Default()
-    initializeRoutes(router, app)
+    // Create response handler
+    responseHandler := handler.NewResponseHandler(
+        controlPanelDriverAdapter,
+        controlPanelDriverAdapter,
+    )
 
-    port := os.Getenv("PORT")
-    if port == "" {
-        port = "8080"
+    // Create control panel service
+    controlPanelService := main.NewControlPanelService(
+        controlPanelDriverAdapter,
+        responseHandler,
+    )
+
+    // Setup routes
+    setupRoutes(router, controlPanelService)
+
+    // Start the server

     }

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,1 +1,36 @@
-
+package main
+
+import (
+    "log"
+    "github.com/gin-gonic/gin"
+    controlpanel "control-panel"
+    "control-panel/handler"
+)
+
+func main() {
+    // Create the main router
+    router := gin.Default()
+
+    // Compose all services
+    controlPanelDriverAdapter := Compose()
+
+    // Create response handler
+    responseHandler := handler.NewResponseHandler(
+        controlPanelDriverAdapter,
+        controlPanelDriverAdapter,
+    )
+
+    // Create control panel service
+    controlPanelService := controlpanel.NewControlPanelService(
+        controlPanelDriverAdapter,
+        responseHandler,
+    )
+
+    // Setup routes
+    setupRoutes(router, controlPanelService)
+
+    // Start the server
+    if err := router.Run(":8080"); err != nil {
+        log.Fatalf("Failed to run server: %v", err)
+    }
+}
